ThingDef.label: persona Modded AR-15
ThingDef.description:
Hellsing ARMS Modded AR-15

An ArmaLite rifle specialized for fighting ghouls and vampires. Its silver bullets are not as powerful as traditional rounds, but inflict extreme damage to the undead. A silver-steel alloy bayonet gives the rifle's wielder a slim chance of fighting back against monsters should they ever find the misfortune of meeting them in melee combat.

This weapon's bayonet and bullets inflict Searing Sanctification to the undead!

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
